title: International Student Data Platform
description: Architected analytics platform reducing time-to-insight 40%. Improved search relevance for 400K+ employers via Meilisearch tuning and Redis caching. Reduced p95 latency 60% with Node.js and Apollo GraphQL optimizations. Automated CI with Jest, Playwright, GitHub Actions.

title: HPCMLX
description: High-Performance Computing and Machine Learning platform. Research and development focused on accelerated computing workflows and ML optimization.

title: Baseball Game Management Dashboard
description: Shipped production releases serving 300+ users. Structured modular backend with Django MTV. Implemented real-time ingestion using Celery, Redis, and PostgreSQL. Maintained zero downtime on GCP with Kubernetes.

title: EdgeDetectr
description: Shipped a fullstack computer vision Edge Detection platform with 100+ monthly users and 99% uptime. Parallelized 5+ image kernels for 3x CPU speedups using C++, OpenMP, and factory polymorphism. Deployed containerized services on AWS ECS.

title: Three Trios
description: Strategy-Based Modular Card Game. Implemented using MVC design pattern with "max card flip" algorithms. Achieved 100% test coverage with JUnit.

title: Spotify UnWrapped
description: Content-Based Recommendation System. Classified 1,000+ songs using Perceptron algorithm. Real-time visualizations with Plotly.

title: AdvisorU
description: College Academic Advisor AI Agent. Integrated RAG with Pinecone and LangChain to query 120+ courses.

title: LinkedIn Post Generator
description: Accelerated post creation by 60% with a ChatGPT-powered Streamlit app.

title: MyVisaJobs Crawler
description: Developed a Python web crawler to extract and analyze university Visa data.

title: SmarterTomorrow
description: Company-Specific Twitter Data Analysis Tool. Increased algorithmic efficiency by 20% with real-time tweet filtering.

title: Matrix-Multiplication-OpenMP
description: High-performance matrix multiplication implementation using OpenMP for parallel processing. Demonstrates optimization techniques for multi-core architectures.

title: Y-Combinator Data Viz
description: Data analysis and visualization of Y Combinator startup data. Explores trends in successful startups using statistical analysis.
